thread.title: Fly From the U.S. to Copenhagen for $332 Round-trip
thread.title_full: Fly From the U.S. to Copenhagen for $332 Round-trip

author: tavakian1271
title: Fly From the U.S. to Copenhagen for $332 Round-trip
text:
Fly From the U.S. to Copenhagen for $332 Round-trip By Talia Avakian 
  
Travelers can score round-trip flights for less than $400 from several U.S. cities to Copenhagen , Denmark, for this November and December. 
Norwegian Air is currently offering round-trip flights from New York Cityâ€™s La Guardia Airport to Copenhagen starting at $332 in November and $340 in December. 
The airline is also offering round-trip flights from Los Angeles to Copenhagen for $344 round-trip in both November and December, on flights departing from Los Angeles International Airport . 
The budget airline is known for its low-cost ticket options, even offering customers $69 flights to Europe .
